document.full_text: philippine catholic bishops on tuesday walked out of talks with the government over a planned bill allowing contraception in open opposition to president benigno aquino who vowed to push the bill into law.
document.title: philippine bishops clash with aquino over contraception bill
lines_and_colors: philippine catholic bishops on tuesday walked out of talks with the government over a planned bill allowing contraception in open opposition to president benigno aquino who vowed to push the bill into law.
